description: This is a Python source file that provides helper functions for configuring OAuth 2.0 settings for Atlassian products (JIRA and Confluence). It reads configuration values from environment variables to facilitate integration with Atlassian Cloud services, ensuring sensitive data is not hardcoded.

methods.name: str get_atlassian_base_url()
methods.description: Returns the base URL for the Atlassian Cloud site, read from environment variable 'ATLASSIAN_CLOUD_BASE_URL'.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_jira_oauth_config()
methods.description: Constructs and returns a dictionary with Jira OAuth configuration details sourced from environment variables.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_confluence_oauth_config()
methods.description: Constructs and returns a dictionary with Confluence OAuth configuration details, defaulting to Jira settings if specific Confluence variables are not provided.

methods.name: str get_frontend_base_url_default()
methods.description: Returns the frontend base URL from environment variable 'FRONTEND_BASE_URL' for redirect purposes.
